About Me

Let me tell you about myself.

Don't Worry. Your project is in safe hands.

Hi! I'm Pranav.
Currently, I'm in 3rd year of bachelor's in Instrumentation and Control Engg. (Major) and Computer Science and Engineering (Minor) from National Institute of Technoplogy, Jalandhar.
Towards the end of first half of my third year ( lol! ), I tried the field of web development after trying out various other fields and fell in love with it.

I intend to pursue a career as a full stack web-developer and am diligentely working my way up.
